definition: Mt Li near Xi'an with the tomb of the First Emperor
black horse/jet steed/good horse/legendary black dragon
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: So very long ago, the Lishan Mountain was a already famous resort.
sentences.chinese: 骊山很早以前就是著名的旅游胜地了。

sentences.english: The beautiful scenery of Lishan Mountain attracts a steady stream of visitors.
sentences.chinese: 骊山的美景吸引了络绎不绝的游人。

sentences.english: But do you know why it's called Lishan?
sentences.chinese: 你知道为什么叫骊山吗？

sentences.english: Today, we are going to take our audience on a tour of the scenic Lishan Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 那我们今天呢就带大家去饱览一下骊山的美景。

sentences.english: Daniel, behind us is the Lishan Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 大牛，咱们身后的是骊山。

sentences.english: Mount Li is not just well-known for its picturesque scenery but also for its hot springs.
sentences.chinese: 骊山不仅以风光绮丽闻名，更有温泉著称。

definition: Mt Taibai in Shaanxi
Zhongnan Mountains, near Xi'an/also known as the Taiyi Mountains
Haojing (in modern Shaanxi, northwest of Chang'an county), capital of Western Zhou from c. 1050 BC
the tomb of the First Emperor at Mt Li 驪山|骊山[Li2 shan1] near Xi'an (awaits excavation)
Qianling at Xianyang 咸陽市|咸阳市 in Shaanxi, burial site of third Tang emperor 高宗 and empress Wuzetian 武則天|武则天
Zhongnan mountains, near Xi'an
the tomb of the first emperor at Mt Li 驪山|骊山[Li2 shan1] near Xi'an (awaits excavation)
Lantian county in Xi'an 西安[Xi1 an1], Shaanxi
Efang Palace, palace complex in western Xi'an built by Qin Shihuang 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2]/also pr. [E1 pang2 Gong1]
Wei River in Shaanxi through the Guanzhong 關中|关中 plain
Mt Hua in Shaanxi, western mountain of the Five Sacred Mountains 五嶽|五岳[Wu3 yue4]
Mt Mang at Luoyang in Henan, with many Han, Wei and Jin dynasty royal tombs
figurines of warriors and horses buried with the dead/Terracotta Army (historic site)
Giant Wild Goose Pagoda in Xi'an
Tang Paradise in Xi'an
Qinling mountain range in Shaanxi forming natural barrier between Guanzhong plain 關中平原|关中平原[Guan1 zhong1 ping2 yuan2] and Han River 漢水|汉水[Han4 shui3] valley
